oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry Hylo Brown on WBOY-TV
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Grand ole opry (Radio program); Monroe, Bill, 1911-1996; Blue Grass Boys
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (red and blue on white) Hatch poster announcing Grand Ole Opry star Hylo Brown and the Timberliners with Timberliners Quartet every Friday on the WBOY-TV channel 12 radio station in Clarksburg. Hylo Brown was sponsored by Martha White. Poster features a metal photoplate of Hylo Brown.
